lead_paragraph: Lonny Baxter, who played for the N.B.A.’s Charlotte Bobcats last season, was ordered held without bail yesterday on firearms charges after he was arrested by uniformed Secret Service officers about two blocks from the White House at about 2:30 a.m. Shots were fired from a vehicle he was driving, the Secret Service said, but the circumstances surrounding the incident were not clear.
